description: Having a baby is one of the biggest moments in any person’s life.  It’s an incredibly exciting time and it means big changes to the way you live as parents.  It’s natural to be a little nervous about those changes. Being a new Father or Mother as soon as your baby is born can be a scary thing. How can you know everything about health, safety, nursing, general parenting and other tips regarding the care of your new infant. This book discusses the most important considerations to caring for a newborn child.  It outlines how to prepare for the child’s arrival, how to bring it home from the hospital, how to handle the baby, the best ways of playing with it and even how to forge a great relationship with your child from the beginning. Download this great ebook today and put your nervousness to rest!
